title: Aaron Carter on Kanye’s Cancellation, Jonny Depp, His Personal Life & More
description:
Shoutout to our Partners at ExpressVPN
Go to https://expressvpn.com/nojump and find out how you can get 3 months of ExpressVPN free!

---
Aaron Carter is back on No Jumper to update us on everything that's been happening in his life since we last linked up. Back with Melanie, custody, new music, label himself a legend and much more!

00:00 Intro
2:23 Aaron's neighbors stalk him, create fake accounts to post about him on Youtube
9:40 Aaron is back with Melanie
10:24 Aaron calls himself a legend, Adam laughs, Aaron names his accomplishments as to why he's a legend + Aaron says he's a rapper
11:36 EXPRESS VPN
14:38 Aaron says he would never go back to Broadway 
15:33 Aaron calls Kanye an idiot and stupid for the WLM shirt
17:53 "There's a reason why Kim left you, get it together!"
18:55 Aaron body sh*mes Pete Davidson and shows his abs + Calls him out for being broken up with by all these celebs
21:02 Aaron talks about his son and how he was taken from him 
22:51 Aaron apologizes to his brother for meddling into the allegations, says these girls were lying 
25:55 Melissa cheated on Aaron, they got into an argument, Melissa got mad after Aaron got a restraining order against her, so she lied to the cops about DV incident, so their kid was taken away
30:39 After all that, they got back together, while the kid lives with the Grandma, Aaron has supervised visits with his son 
35:49 Aaron has to complete the program, doctors visits, dr*g tests etc to get his kid back 39:19 Aaron writes and produces all his current music, while he never wrote anything for his younger music 
40:53 Aaron doesn't care about the perception of him and chews ice on the mic44:06 Aaron calls Kanye broke and stupid
44:50 Aaron would still work with Kanye now and talk sense to him 
45:45 Aaron thinks the Yeezy brand can still survive 
47:05 Doesn't talk to Britney, and wants to repair the relationship with his brother 
50:20 Gives himself a pat on the back for everything he's done
59:45 Adam asks if Aaron f with Amber Heard or Jonny Depp, Aaron answers about something else
1:00:40 Adam calls Aaron 'Nick'! And Adam lost the chain Aaron gifted him + Declines to do a Tiktok with Adam
